name: Fat City
description: In this action-puzzler with 60 targets spread throughout the five boroughs of New York City, players will use their cunning and brain power to plan raids and execute getaways to pull in the big bucks in the city that never sleeps.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+, Steam OS+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 (feature level 9.3 capabilities) Storage: 657 MB available space
